Reviews.Title: Galaxy Mega on Straight Talk
Reviews.Author: Superglued
Reviews.Content: I bought a samsung mega 5.8 in October for my self and another mega 5.8 for Christmas for my husband.  Both of them are running on Straight Talk.  All we had to buy is the micro sim card from Straight Talk (we bought the At&T; card) and off we went.  My internet and MMS (pic messages) work great with no problems.  The screen on the mega is awesome!  Both of us get compliments all the time on our phones and people are amazed that both of them are on Straight Talk with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone!!!!
Reviews.Author: BESTGUY
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THE PHONE November 14, 2013Once you use it you may not want a Galaxy Note. Love the Dual SIM feature. Light and nice battery last long.UPDATE (01/08/2014)-Both SIM's work great. One has AT & T and other has STRAIGHT TALK (AT & T version).-Good internet speeds.-Awesome camera and shooting modes-I do not use a separate Tablet and Phone.... Both in one-Everyone's eyes popped out at the beauty I was carrying (In the US and Mexico)-Stuck-in a 32 GB micro-SD card and works great to expand memory-Android software has options to turn ON/OFF either or both the SIM's-Android software has options to choose which phone number(SIM) to be used for messaging or phone call..... cool feature-AT & T store guy's jaws dropped (like they saw an alien gadget) when he saw the awesome options of the phone and Android OS.-My purchase from seller was perfectly priced and shipping was the best...

Reviews.Title: galaxy mega GT-i9152 (5.8")
Reviews.Author: crystaz
Reviews.Content: this phone is awesome!  large screen, great resolution, terrific speakers!have no problems switching from bluetooth to wi-fi and back, switching gps function on or off - easy to navigate!and dual-sim capability - YES!it's NOT a note 2 or note 3 so you can't compare - each upgrade of phone will have its pluses and minusesmulti-language features abound, you should not have a problem using this phone internationally (but check first to make sure)if you want all of the above, works great for us in the U.S.!

Reviews.Title: THIS IS IT
Reviews.Author: Boadolf
Reviews.Content: It you need an AMAZING smartphone, then you got it. I bought this phone, it's unlocked and yo can use it anywhere on this planet(with a micro sim). Not to talk much...Give it a TRY!!! It will blow up your mind.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: aallen2005
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for almost 2 months and haven' had any issues.  My wife has a white one from the same seller and both are good phones.  They do the job and you can't beat the price.  Battery life is excellent and way better than any phone I have had in the past.  If you wanted the Galaxy note but don't want to pay the price this is the phone to get.  Works flawless.......A++

Reviews.Title: It's BIG!!
Reviews.Author: Steven W. Shackelford "steve"
Reviews.Content: So far in 1 week- so good! But, this was made for the UK Version. Hope this does not create any problems!? And... it comes with Jellybean 4.2.2 - a good thing!! Most other Mega 5.8s do not have already installed recent OS updates!!

Reviews.Title: Not product from the picture
Reviews.Author: Vicky
Reviews.Content: I bought his phone thinking it was the one from the picture but it wasn't! I was so excited when I got it but when I opened the package I was so disappointed! It was nothing from the picture!:(

Reviews.Title: DUAL SIM ADVANTAGE
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: If you are aware of what you are buying the phone is excellent. It is definitely not a NOTE 3 and it is a little bit oversize. But if you want a big screen and dual sim together from a trusted manufacturer you do not have much choices. As a result if you can tolerate the size I think this is the best phone you can buy.Dual sim works perfect. I gave up my Galaxy s4 to use this dual sim device and I am happy. Actually a regular user can not see a big difference from the s4 aside from the size and display quality.Buy it with confidence if you need a big display with dual sim. Otherwise dont bother.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phablet
Reviews.Author: Marcio Suazo
Reviews.Content: Its all that i need without having to pay $600 plus dollars for a flagship phone, sure it has its lower performance fetaures compared with the to of the line phones, but for what you really need a phone is more than enough.I definitely recomend this itrem.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: davi
Reviews.Content: The phone is not as powerful as the note 2 or 3, but it is a great phone and gets the Job done.

Reviews.Title: Works with straight talk perfectly!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Corey Ratcliff
Reviews.Content: Bout this phone around December and I am a very happy satisfied customer. Very happy with my purchase. Got it cut on with bring your own phone straight talk activation!!! Out of the 4 SIM cards that came with the bring your own phone activation, I had to put the t-mobile sim in the phone, I told myself I don't want t-mobile towers I want AT&T;, we'll, I called straight and they took me from point a to point b to set-up my samsung galaxy mega gt-i9152 and even told me the settings to change in order to get picture mail and Internet and AT&T; towers, had no problems, I've read reviews of other comments of problems with picture mail and internet, problem solved, just ask them to help you with those settings!!! Great buy for me!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Bruce in Venice
Reviews.Content: BIG screen, plus it fits in my pants or shirt pocket.  Only one negative, doesn't work w my blue tooth.

Reviews.Title: Get a Note!
Reviews.Author: Eric Brown
Reviews.Content: Phone quit working after 15 days of use.  Speakers were atrocious.  Could not hear anything out of them.  Had a Note 2 before and got a Note 3 after.

Reviews.Title: I don't recommend the international version
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Rowley "Nick Danger"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because I wanted a dual sim phone. I had problems out of the box and wanted technical support. Unfortunately since the international version comes from the United Kingdom you have to call England for assistance.It is a nice phone but I returned and purchased a Galaxy Note III

Reviews.Title: A striking smart phone
Reviews.Author: Ed G.
Reviews.Content: I love old classic movies. In those movies it was not unusual to see an old-fashioned rotary dial phone used as a murder weapon. Over the years I've noticed that as phones have become smaller, lighter, and flimsier, so have the movies. Lately, though, smart phones have grown larger and bulkier, most notably this Samsung Galaxy Mega.  Now that we once again have phones that can be used as a bludgeon, I feel a surge of hope that movies, too, might regain their former weight and substance. Thanks Samsung!

ProductInfo.Features:
Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz
Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 Mhz
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Mega GT-I9152 Unlocked Dual Sim Android Smartphone - Black
